comment.description: Optional. A human-readable description or note for developers or modders; ignored by the interpreter at runtime.

condition.description: Optional. If present, this operation only executes if the JSON-Logic condition evaluates to true.

Parameters.description: Parameters for the QUERY_ENTITIES operation. Finds entities matching a set of filters.

result_variable.description: Required. The context variable to store the resulting array of entity IDs in.

limit.description: Optional. The maximum number of entity IDs to return.

filters.description: Required. An array of filter conditions. An entity must pass all filters to be included.

by_location.description: Filter for entities in a specific location ID.

with_component.description: Filter for entities that have a specific component type.

with_component_data.description: Advanced filter for entities based on data within one of their components.
